attributes.action: Encourage airlines to charge passengers by total weight of passenger plus all baggage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Airline fuel use and therefore costs are largely determined by weight. Charging passengers by total weight is an obvious extension of what already applies to freight and would remove unfair anomalies. It would also be a big step in making passengers aware of and pay for their carbon use directly.
